args:
Given this political fundraising email, respond with the name of the committee in the disclaimer that begins with Paid for by but does not include Paid for by, the committee address or the treasurer name. If no committee is present, return "None". Do not include any other text, no yapping.
name: Trisha Calvarese
email: info@trisha4co.com
subject: a serious problem
body: I have to be honest: We have a real problem. | _Unsubscribe_ ![](https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP50/1/111662/images/Calvarese-Logo-Email-620x115.png.png)  Peter, Trisha Calvarese here, the Democratic nominee running against Lauren Boebert. My team and I are working hard to flip Colorado’s 4th congressional district blue so that Democrats can take back the House, finally put an end to Lauren Boebert’s ridiculous political career, and stop Boebert from receiving a lifetime congressional pension. **But I have to be honest: With less than 3 days left until Election Day, we have a real problem.** Right now, we’re falling behind on our fundraising goals, and my team tells me that unless we raise another $30,000 before midnight tonight, we’re going to have to cut our GOTV budget – and risk losing to Lauren Boebert… Boebert won by only 546 votes in 2022. We cannot afford to give up any ground. **That’s why I am launching an Emergency Midnight Fundraising Goal of raising another $30,000 to get us back on track to beating Boebert and flipping this seat blue.** **I’m counting on grassroots donors like you if we’re going to win: Please, will you make a donation right now to my campaign to help me defeat Lauren Boebert and take back the House for Democrats?** _Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation through ActBlue:_ | | | **DONATE $10** ---  | **DONATE $25** ---  | | **DONATE $35** ---  | **DONATE $50** ---  | | **DONATE $100** ---  | **Other Amount** ---  Lauren Boebert is a national embarrassment, but with your help now, we canfinally fire her.Let’s finish this campaign strong!Thank you,Trisha  ********Paid for by Trisha 4 ColoradoTrisha 4 Colorado PO Box 630633 Highlands Ranch, CO 80130Contributions or gifts to Trisha 4 Colorado are not tax deductible.This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. If you received this email in error or if you don't want to receive any emailsfrom us anymore, please click here to unsubscribe.**********  ****** | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. To update your email address, change your name or address, or to stop receiving emails from Trish 4 Colorado, please click here.  ---  ![](https://click.actionnetwork.org/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b4/_PE05p5OS5e2s7Ucbi3VQg/ho.gif)
